rows.label: bf03220100_0010
rows.name:
Oh, it's you guys?
What got you out of bed so early?

rows.label: bf03220100_0020
rows.name: Nia?

rows.label: bf03220100_0030
rows.name:
Thanks for yesterday.
You saved our skins.

rows.label: bf03220100_0040
rows.name:
That guy, Yoshitsune, I mean... I wanted
to tell you about him, you see...

rows.label: bf03220100_0050
rows.name: Thing is, we used to be...

rows.label: bf03220100_0060
rows.name:
Being a mercenary...
You meet all different folks.

rows.label: bf03220100_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...Huh?

rows.label: bf03220100_0080
rows.name:
Your country, family, money...
People got plenty of reasons to fight.

rows.label: bf03220100_0090
rows.name:
Like fighting for a special girl. I see that a lot.
Though no every girl has a strange crystal in her chest?

rows.label: bf03220100_0100
rows.name:
Y-you mean Homura?
W-we're just...

rows.label: bf03220100_0110
rows.name:
Nia, you're with these guys right now.
That's what matters.

rows.label: bf03220100_0120
rows.name: But...aren't you...

rows.label: bf03220100_0130
rows.name:
Anyway. Rex, weren't you saying you
wanted to get to Eden?

rows.label: bf03220100_0140
rows.name: Yeah... But we hit a snag...

rows.label: bf03220100_0150
rows.name:
With a monster like that in the way,
it's impossible.

rows.label: bf03220100_0160
rows.name:
No Guild ship's getting close to
it without going down.

rows.label: bf03220100_0170
rows.name:
Well, I've got an old mate.
In the Invidian capital.

rows.label: bf03220100_0180
rows.name: Got a feeling he might know a way through.

rows.label: bf03220100_0190
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: bf03220100_0200
rows.name:
Yeah. I gotta go there anyhow.
So I could introduce you.

rows.label: bf03220100_0210
rows.name: Vandham-san! Thank you!

rows.label: bf03220100_0220
rows.name:
Nah! It's destiny or something.
Don't sweat it.

rows.label: bf03220100_0230
rows.name:
Get your stuff together and meet me by
the village entrance.
